events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the item because it doesn't fit and I would like a refund.
The customer's request matches our refund and return policy, categorizing the issue as Refund.
Assigning this refund case to our returns specialist team to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return, so we can expedite your refund?
My order number is 123456789. The shirt is too small and I was hoping to get my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. You can send the shirt back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your full refund.
That sounds good, thanks! I'll send it back today and look forward to the refund.
We've sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please use it to return the item, and your refund will be processed promptly afterward.
Just checking in to confirm that you sent the item back and to let you know that the refund should be processed within 3 business days upon receipt.
Yes, I returned it yesterday. Thank you for the support, I appreciate the quick response.
The refund has been completed successfully. Closing this case now. Feel free to contact us for any further assistance.
We have sent you a brief survey to rate your experience with our returns process. Your feedback is valuable to us.
